version_description:
* Quick Add to Cart: iPhone 6s or 6s+ users can hold down a product to quickly add it to cart.
* Minor bug fixes and performance improvements to make our app faster and better than ever.

* My Account: You can now manage your account, track and view your orders and see your Points balance from the app.
* Minor bug fixes and performance improvements to make our app faster and better than ever.
* Minor bug fixes and performance improvements to make our app faster and better than ever.

* Refer A Friend: You can now invite friends to Birchbox from the app and receive Points for every friend who joins!
* Minor bug fixes and performance improvements to make our app faster and better than ever.

○ Ship With Box: You can now ship full-size items (for free!) with your monthly box, directly from the Product page. It's the easiest way to shop!
○ We've given our Product pages a makeover! You can now view multiple product images, zoom into images and easily view and change product shades.
○ Minor bug fixes and performance improvements to make our app faster and better than ever.

○ Minor bug fixes and performance improvements to make our app faster and better than ever.
